title: Global cost of living and rising prices - S3

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What's the historical context here?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: This is following a pattern we've seen before. Remember GDPR in 2018? Similar timeline and approach, but that was for data privacy.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: And how did that go?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: 40% compliance first year, 80% by deadline. Expect similar here.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: So there's a playbook.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Right. And before that, Section 230 debates in 2021 set the stage for thinking about platform responsibility.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: This is just the AI-specific version.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Exactly. It's been building for years. The industry knew regulation was coming, they just didn't know what form it would take.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: And now they do.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Now they do. The 18-month timeline gives them time to prepare, but they need to start now.

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: History tells us this is doable.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: It is. The companies that start early will have an easier time. The ones that wait until the deadline will scramble.
